# MPVolumeSettingsAlertShow()

**Function**

Displays an alert panel for controlling the system volume.

## Declaration

```swift
func MPVolumeSettingsAlertShow()
```

## Discussion

The alert panel displayed by this function floats above the contents of the current window. It contains a slider for adjusting the system volume setting and a Done button so that the user can dismiss the panel. You can also dismiss the panel programmatically using the [doc://com.apple.mediaplayer/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPVolumeSettingsAlertHide()] function.

## Global volume setting methods

- **MPVolumeSettingsAlertHide()**: Hides the alert panel that controls the system volume.
- **MPVolumeSettingsAlertIsVisible()**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the volume alert panel is currently visible.
